remarks: A bound on a sum of logs, used in ~ pntlemk .  This is not as precise as ~ logdivsum in its asymptotic behavior, but it is valid for all ` N ` and does not require a limit value.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
logdivbnd $p |- ( N e. NN -> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... N ) ( ( log ` n ) / n ) <_ ( ( ( ( log ` N ) + 1 ) ^ 2 ) / 2 ) ) $.
$d N n $.
